extendedInfo.description: The world's largest network of gay and lesbian news and entertainment portals is now available on your Android device! Headlines EDGE publishes gay news, entertainment, business, technology, style, health, fitness, travel and nightlife information to readers around the world. For the gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgender community, staying connected on the go has never been so easy. Columnists Read commentary from individuals from within and without the gay community about life, relationships, and the issues facing gays and lesbians the world over. Photos Flip through photos taken by EDGE's team in cities around the world. Did we catch you or your friends at a nightlife or community event? Find out - even when you're not at your computer. Giveaway Center Win fabulous prizes including DVD/Blu-Ray discs, CDs, theatre and movie tickets and more! Subscribers can enter contests with a tap of a finger!

reviews.title: Good .app .. but ..
reviews.comment: It\'s a good App .. love the ability to read about what is going on with the \"community\", however this last update needs to be better .. I am getting TWO of the load screens when exiting out of the app.
reviews.author: Jason Titter

reviews.title: Best Gay daily news
reviews.comment: The news is almost as it happens.  World wide news.  Really love and appreciate the work EDGE does.  Thanks to the staff.
reviews.author: Derek JA

reviews.title: Update is great
reviews.comment: Thank you!
reviews.author: Jim P

reviews.title: Great source of news
reviews.comment: I love this app great source of news
reviews.author: Jr Zanders

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait for the jet packs guys... Excellent job.
reviews.author: Rachel Davies

reviews.title: Love the stories, but one small thing I dislike th
reviews.comment: I loved the older version. You could keep reading old stories the further you scrolled down, but now once you reach a set bottom, you can\'t go any further anymore :/. Still, it\'s a great reading app.
reviews.author: christopher emery

reviews.title: Fix for bug?
reviews.comment: The new update isnt that great an causes crashing if you download just the update... i uninstalled the app an reinstalled an its working properly for me now. Ill update if i find any trouble again.
reviews.author: Caleb Burgess

reviews.comment: Love It!
reviews.author: Anthony Gonzales

reviews.title: Err!
reviews.comment: Come on guys.... After update it won\'t load any images. I love this app, and I do realise sometimes an update can cause problems for some people... (err, me) please fix as I need my edge fix... Otherwise great app and like the changes. :o)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great content, poor app
reviews.comment: This app has always been slow and a little clumsy. New version is slower and has a new, unhelpful front page to go through before getting to what had been the front page.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update broke it- fixed now
reviews.comment: Developer did another update and the app us working.  Like the new layout and changes much better.    The other update had completely broken the app, Xoom & Atrix HD.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gone downhill.
reviews.comment: New update ruins app.  It is still functional,  but the UI is horrible.  Also much slower.  Strongly considering uninstalling.  Perhaps more updates will revert back to how it was... Then reviews will have more stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Version 2.02 fixes all problems in 2.01. Back to 5 stars.
reviews.comment: New interface now works. On a tablet, it is better than the version 1 interface.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love but...
reviews.comment: For news, I cannot scroll down to the older news
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why can\'t I share?
reviews.comment: I enjoy reading news articles on this app, especially stories I would otherwise never hear about. But I don\'t understand why I can\'t share articles ...the option to share is there but if I do share it doesn\'t share the article! It shares a link to edge home page. .I want to share articles!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Can you also add more articles to make it more active?
reviews.author: guillermo escorcia

reviews.title: Crash Test Dummies
reviews.comment: Since the new look, this app crashes every single time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hello.
reviews.comment: Clean, thorough niche news reportage.
reviews.author: Michael Wayne

reviews.title: Not a fan!
reviews.comment: I relied on the Edge app for my community news, but the front page is such a pain, I\'ve turned to HuffPost. I\'m hanging on hoping they will improve the navigation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unhappy
reviews.comment: Dont like the new update. Loved how it was
reviews.author: A Google User
